channel.title: Client background issue OKEASE HELP
channel.description:
I'm having some issues with my client. I've been trying to change the background image that loads before you play however is just won't work. If I go and change the background.png in my cache folder it works fine... but when I try to change the background image, zip the cache up and put it on dropbox so that the cache can download dierectly instead of having to download the cache as well it goes back to the old background image and I get the error:
[code]Kasparscape is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\acheron.cache\acheron.cache.zip?dl=0 (The file name, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:221) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:110) at CacheDownloader.downloadFile(CacheDownloader.java:106) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:80) at client.startUp(client.java:9376) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:34) at client.run(client.java:6280) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\acheron.cache\acheron.cache.zip?dl=0 (The file name, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:146) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:101) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:164) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:82) at client.startUp(client.java:9376) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:34) at client.run(client.java:6280) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) UNZIP java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\acheron.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system c annot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:146) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:101) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:134) at client.startUp(client.java:9377) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:34) at client.run(client.java:6280) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257[/code]

item.title: Client background issue OKEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:


If only compilers said the error...

If only compilers said the error…

item.title: Client background issue OKEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

remove “dl=0” so it ends in .zip

Read full topic

item.title: Client background issue OKEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @ikaspar ikaspar
item.description:
@ikaspar wrote:

Any idea why it won’t accept the new cache? I put the link to it in client.java and cachedownloader.java my cache is on dropbox. Should I use something else?

Read full topic

item.title: Client background issue OKEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @popcorn57 popcorn57
item.description:
@popcorn57 wrote:

its not the background image that is the problem its the auto cache. since it wont download your new cache it is resolving the issue by downloading the old one/regular acheron cache.

Read full topic
